channel.title: Mental
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Mental, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Can Stress *Actually* Make You Sick? A New Study Found The Answer
item.description: Chronic stress and sleep issues don't just feel bad. They may actively thin the immune army meant to protect you, a new study reveals.
